spec_data.Name: ctan-cm-lgc-sans-fonts
spec_data.Description:
The CM-LGC PostScript Type 1 fonts are converted from the METAFONT
sources of the Computer Modern font families. CM-LGC supports the T1, T2A,
LGR, and TS1 encodings, i.e. Latin, Cyrillic, and Greek.
This package contains the CM-LGC sans-serif typeface based on Computer Modern.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:07:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: CM-LGC Type 1 fonts, sans-serif font faces
